00015 PSRCassandra::PSRCassandra (Cassandra& c) : 
00016     Cassandra (c.actionTransitions, c.actionObservations,  c.rewards,
00017                c.numActions, c.numStates, c.numObservations, c.discount)
00018     
00019 {
00020     
00021     discoverPSR();

00042 int PSRCassandra::doAction (int action) {
00043         assert (action < (int)numActions);
00044         
00045         currAction = action;
00046         
00047         //update state.
00048         lastState = currState;
00049 
00050         noalias (*stateTransRow) = row (actionTransitions [currAction], lastState);
00051         currState = Sampler::discrete ((*stateTransRow), 1.0);
00052 
00053         noalias (*observationRow) = row (actionObservations [currAction], currState);
00054         
00055         currObservation = Sampler::discrete ((*observationRow) , 1.0);
00056 
00057 
00058         
00059         //cout << "start belief state generation." << endl;
00060         //cout << "action: " << action << endl;
00061         //cout << "Initial Belief: " << (*belief) << endl;
00062         
00063         // Update the PSR vector
00064 
00065         
00066         // Column tests.
00067         string prefix;
00068         prefix.push_back((char)(currAction + '0'));     
00069         prefix.push_back((char)(currObservation + '0'));
00070 
00071         Vector norm(1);
00072 
00073         
00074         // See how accurate we were
00075 /*
00076         norm=prod(belief, oneStepParams[prefix]);
00077         double prob;
00078         prob = norm[0];
00079         cout<<"Predicted real action/obs="<<currAction<<","<<currObservation<<" = "<<prob<<endl;
00080 */
00081 
00082         // Gives a vector
00083         noalias(btp1) = prod(belief, coreParams[prefix]);
00084         norm=prod(belief, oneStepParams[prefix]);
00085         belief = btp1/norm[0];
00086         
00087         return 0;
00088 }

00094 void PSRCassandra::discoverPSR() {
00095 
00096     cout<<"Entering discovery\n";
00097     // Do depth first search looking for core tests
00098 
00099     // U is initially empty test prediction=column vec of 1's
00100     // plus space for an extra core test.
00101 
00102     Matrix U(numStates, 2); 
00103     U.assign(scalar_matrix<double>(numStates, 2, 1.0));
00104 
00105     // Column 0 is empty test.
00106     coreTests[""] = 0;
00107         
00108     string test("");
00109 
00110     recursePSRDiscovery(test, U);
00111 
00112     // At this point we have one too many columns in U
00113     // Reduce down to core test size. 
00114     cout<<"U before:"<<U<<endl;
00115     U.resize(numStates, coreTests.size(), true);
00116     cout<<"U after:"<<U<<endl;
00117 
00118     // Compute paramters for each core test and one step extension.
00119     cout<<"Core tests:\n";
00120     for (TestsMap::iterator q=coreTests.begin(); q != coreTests.end(); q++) {
00121         cout<<"\t"<<q->first<<endl;
00122     }
00123 
00124 
00125     // All core test params for single step
00126     Matrix Mao(coreTests.size(), coreTests.size());
00127     // single step params
00128     Matrix mao(coreTests.size(), 1); 
00129 
00130     Matrix  O(numStates, numStates);
00131     O.clear();
00132 
00133     // Get pseudo invese of U
00134     Matrix UInv(coreTests.size(), numStates);
00135     UBlasExtras::pseudoInverse(U, UInv);
00136 
00137     Matrix UInvT(coreTests.size(), numStates);
00138     Matrix UInvTO(coreTests.size(), numStates);
00139  
00140     // Loop over one step prefix extensions
00141     // computing PSR parameters
00142     for (size_t a=0; a < numActions; a++) {
00143         for (size_t o=0; o < numObservations; o++) {
00144             string prefix;
00145             prefix.push_back((char)(a + '0'));
00146             prefix.push_back((char)(o + '0'));
00147 
00148             cout<<"Computing params for a="<<a<<" o="<<o<<" '"<<prefix<<"'"<<endl;
00149             for (size_t s=0; s < numStates; s++) {
00150                 // Prob of action o, in state s, given action a
00151                 O(s,s) = (actionObservations[a])(s, o); 
00152             }
00153 
00154             
00155             axpy_prod(UInv, actionTransitions[a], UInvT, true); // clear first
00156             axpy_prod(UInvT, O, UInvTO, true);
00157             axpy_prod(UInvTO, U, Mao, true); // Find core parameters
00158             // Find step parametersa
00159             axpy_prod(UInvTO, scalar_matrix<double>(numStates, 1, 1.0), mao, true); 
00160             
00161             // Copy to appropriate structures
00162             coreParams[prefix] = Mao;
00163             oneStepParams[prefix] = mao;
00164 
00165             //cout<<"Mao for '"<<prefix<<"' = "<<coreParams[prefix]<<endl;
00166             //cout<<"mao for '"<<prefix<<"' = "<<oneStepParams[prefix]<<endl;
00167 
00168         }
00169     }    
00170 
00171 }

00173 
00177 bool PSRCassandra::recursePSRDiscovery(string test, Matrix& U) {
00178 
00179     cout<<"recursing discovery for '"<<test<<"'\n";
00180     Matrix  O(numStates, numStates);
00181     O.clear();
00182     string candidate;
00183 
00184 
00185     // Loop over one step prefix extensions
00186     for (size_t a=0; a < numActions; a++) {
00187         for (size_t o=0; o < numObservations; o++) {
00188             
00189             candidate.clear();
00190             // Construct candidate core test string
00191             candidate.push_back((char)(a + '0'));
00192             candidate.push_back((char)(o + '0'));
00193             candidate += test;
00194 
00195             cout<<"\tCreated candidate '"<<candidate<<"'\n";
00196             // Construct diagonal observation matrix for obs o, and action a
00197             for (size_t s=0; s < numStates; s++) {
00198                 // Prob of action o, in state s, given action a
00199                 O(s,s) = (actionObservations[a])(s, o); 
00200             }
00201             cout<<"\tCreated diag matrix for '"<<candidate<<"'\n";
00202 
00203             // Update so called "outcome" vector
00204             Vector tmp(numStates);
00205             noalias(tmp) = prod(O, column(U, coreTests[test]));
00206             cout<<"\tstep 2\n";
00207             column(U, coreTests.size()) = prod(actionTransitions[a], tmp);
00208 
00209             // Check rank of new U matrix. If we added a linearly
00210             // *DE*pendent vector then the rank will be
00211             // coreTests.size() But if it's one more than
00212             // coreTests.size() we have found a new core test and it's
00213             // time to recurse the search.
00214             cout<<"\tDoing SVD\n";
00215             size_t rank = UBlasExtras::rank(U);
00216             cout<<"\tRank="<<rank<<"\n";
00217             assert(rank <= U.size2()); // Rank less than smallest dim
00218             assert(rank <= numStates); // Something has gone seriously wrong!
00219             
00220             // We found a new core test!
00221             if (rank > coreTests.size()) {
00222                 cout<<"Adding '"<<candidate<<"' to core tests\n";
00223                 int pos = coreTests.size();
00224                 coreTests[candidate] = pos;
00225                 // Add space for a new core test, not touching
00226                 // existing data.
00227                 U.resize(numStates, coreTests.size() + 1, true);
00228                 recursePSRDiscovery(candidate, U);
00229             }
00230             else if (rank < coreTests.size()) {
00231                 cout<<"Something has gone wrong checking '"
00232                     <<candidate<<"', rank="
00233                     <<rank
00234                     <<" less than current core test set\n";
00235                 //throw std::runtime_error("PSR Discovery failed");
00236             }
00237 
00238         }
00239     }
00240 
00241     return true;
00242 
00243 }

00246 Vector PSRCassandra::getBelief () {
00247     return belief;
00248 }

00250 
00251 void PSRCassandra::getObservation (Observation& obs) {
00252     for(size_t i = 0; i < coreTests.size(); i++) {
00253         obs.getFeatures() (i,0) = belief[i];
00254     }
00255     if (obs.getSteps()%10000==0) cout<<"Obs: "<<obs.getFeatures()<<endl;
00256 }

00259 int PSRCassandra::getObsRows () {
00260     return coreTests.size();
00261 }
